managePro: Manage your wholesale business like a pro
validPhoneErr: Please enter a valid Bangladeshi number (e.g. 017xxxxxxxx)
deleteEntryDesc: This record will be permanently removed and the balance updated.
deleteRetailerDesc: Wipe all data for this customer? This cannot be undone.
whatsappPrefix: Dear {name}, your current due at our shop is à§³{balance}. Please clear it soon. Thank you!
title: Retailers
searchPlaceholder: Search by name or shop name
name: Name
noRetailersDesc: Try searching with a different name or add a new retailer to your ledger.
reportDesc: Detailed monthly reports are generated based on your local ledger data.
logoutDesc: You will need to log back in to access your business ledger records.
deleteDesc: Warning: This will permanently delete every customer and transaction. This cannot be undone.
secureStorageDesc: Your credit records are stored safely on this device. Your data privacy is our priority.
aiStrategyDesc: Prioritize recovering your stagnant capital through structured collection targets to instantly boost your liquidity and reinvest in growth. Simultaneously, focus on diversifying your client base beyond two retailers to minimize financial risk and ensure a more consistent cash flow.
privacyPolicyContent: Your data is stored locally on this device. We do not share your customer credit records with any third party.
helpContent: Manage your wholesale ledger with ease. Tap a retailer to see full history or add a new transaction. Use the reports tab for monthly summaries.
termsContent: By using BakiLedger, you agree to maintain the confidentiality of your account. Records are managed locally for your convenience.
aboutContent: BakiLedger Professional Edition v1.0.4. Empowering Bangladeshi wholesalers through smart digital accounting solutions.
